messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: As a local businessman, I will be a strong and independent voice for Mid Dorset and North Poole. I will work hard to protect our natural and cultural heritage and provide help for our local communities and economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRE Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: The Future of Our Country must not be in the hands of unelected and unaccountable bureaucrats in Brussels. UKIP believes that Britain will be a fairer, more prosperous and more democratic society by leaving the EU.
issues.environment: Protect our natural and cultural heritage.
issues.health: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
issues.socialWelfare: SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe in individual freedom, personal responsibility and a low tax, small state economy.

contactInformation.address: Communications House, 26 West Street, Wimborne, Dorset, BH21 1JS.

images.caption: Richard Turner with UK Independence Party branding.
